name: Guess Who's Guess is as Good as Mine? Trivia Game  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these words means "nude" in the U.K.?
questions.explanation:
starkers.

	And that's the bare naked truth ...

questions.text: Which is the largest gulf in the world?
questions.explanation:
The Gulf of Mexico.

	Some great vacation spots ...

questions.text: Konrad Kujau was jailed for forging what?
questions.explanation:
Hitler's Diaries.

	Some very prominent news organizations purchased the serial rights to the 'Hitler Diaries', which goes to show that some people will buy just about anything.

questions.text: To what did Idlewild Airport change its name?
questions.explanation:
John F. Kennedy

	JFK is one of the busiest international airports in the world and it is the first sight of America that most visitors to New York get.

questions.text: Which painter's Blue Period was preceded by his Rose Period?
questions.explanation:
Pablo Picasso.

	This Spanish genius actually lived most of his life in France.

questions.text: Who once crossed Niagara Falls on a tightrope with his agent on his back?
questions.explanation:
Charles Blondin.

	Both made it safely across...

questions.text: Madame de Pompadour was the mistress of which French king?
questions.explanation:
Louis XV.

	Almost required accessories to the Monarchy were mistresses ...

questions.text: Where were finger prints first used as a means of identification?
questions.explanation:
China.

	A means of identification surpassed only by DNA testing.

questions.text: What did the English Parliament give to Winston Churchill for his 80th birthday?
questions.correct: His portrait, painted by Graham Sutherland
options: The keys to the City of London
questions.explanation:
His portrait, painted by Graham Sutherland.

	What else do you give a man who has practically everything, and is too old to enjoy it ....

questions.text: In which city did money (banknotes, bills) suddenly drop from the sky on October 8, 1976?
questions.explanation:
Rome.

	Gives a whole new meaning to pennies from heaven.
